thread.section_title: Hotel Concortel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: My favorite hotel in Paris
thread.title_full: My favorite hotel in Paris - Review of Hotel Concortel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MI0102
title: My favorite hotel in Paris
text:
My last stay was in March 2017. I have been staying in this hotel whenever visiting Paris for about 20 years, and this hotel is only getting better and better.
Family owned, a lot of efforts are invested in always improving the facilities and the interior design. Romms are exceptionally spacious and comfortable. All very clean.
Breakfast a la cart has wonderful eggs plat. You will enjoy a quiet tea in the lobby late afternoon, relaxing from long Paris walks
good value for your money..
I'll definitely be back., as always.
Room Tip: Personally I prefer street looking rooms, more sunny. Backyard rooms may be other people's choic... See more room tips
